channel.title: Regular Monster Summoning
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Regular Monster Summoning" - This Week: Monday

item.title: Re: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded: Point taken! Restarting this thread to formulate it in the negative sense.

item.title: Re: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded: Ah, well activation works a bit differently than I thought. I figured you would activate it and we would be attacked on the next day roll. Interesting!

item.title: Re: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded:
What if, instead of voting for which day people would prefer, people vote for which day (or days) that would conflict with something, then go with whichever day the fewest players have conflicts on? For me, Monday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday are all equally good. Perhaps there's some day that everyone (or almost everyone) would be comfortable with that just hasn't been mentioned.

Personally, I'd prefer to not do Tuesday, but if that's what people want, then I can get on briefly to fight the monster (though I'd probably be dead by the time I get on v.v)

item.title: Re: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded:
Activation unfortunately depends on how tired I am. If I'm not tired, I'll be up at dayroll and do it right when the new day officially starts in BvS. (So late Sunday night for Monday). However, I'm a human being, and I do have a job, so there are times when I fall asleep before dayroll. Those days, it'd be in the morning.

So, it'd be sometime between dayroll and noon PST for most summons.

(Would any of the Monday votes be comfortable with it being on Tuesday? I don't care that strongly about Monday, and it seems there are some who do have a strong dislike to Monday, so I'd be willing to change my vote to Tuesday if there's not a similar argument against Tuesday).

item.title: Re: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded:
Vote: GogoluG - Monday

Because additional +50 weekly stamina bonus.

item.title: Re: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded:
Vote: schon - tuesday

My mondays are usually packed with crap that needs to be addressed after the weekend is over. Tuesday is my first chance to breathe during the week.

item.title: Re: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded:
If we fight the monster Monday, wouldn't activation be on Sunday?
My only problem with Monday (or any weekday), is by the time I am in to work it is dead!

Vote: Darkshard - Tuesday!

EDIT: I agree with Schon that Monday's are busy!

item.title: Re: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded:
Vote: Uzuki - Monday

(People seem to play from work pretty regularly, so playing actually drops off over the weekend. Starting the work week off with a monster seems like a good idea to me).

item.title: Regular Monster Summoning
item.content:encoded:
On Summoning. I'd like to designate one day of the week for summoning a monster. If we have not had a monster in the past 7 days, and we have greater than 20 of a resource on the designated day, we'll summon a monster. What day would you prefer for this?

Sunday
Monday - 3 - Lear, GogoluG, Uzuki
Tuesday - 3 - Darkshard, naito, and schon
Wednesday
Thursday
Friday
Saturday

Current Leader: Monday

Please vote in the following format:

 Vote: <name> - <day>
